creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and image of a cellar door, with "ABC NO RIO" written in a pink paint marker, so as to appear to be written on the door; 40 pp.
inscription: front cover, pink paint marker: ABC / NO / RIO
title: enter the nineties: poets, punks, politics
